website_summaries.verdict: A delicious, low calorie treat that's perfect for cats on a diet, or cats who want several treats.
pros: Snacks are high in protein and low in fat
Flakes can be enjoyed on their own or added to your cat’s food for a flavor boost
Delicious fish flavor appeals to even the pickiest of cats
cons: The most expensive treats on our shortlist

customer_reviews.title: Too Shredded. SMALL CRUMBS. Not many Flakes.
customer_reviews.text: My Cat meows every day @ 10:30a for her Flakes. She loves these & for over 3 yrs, I have purchased over 30 bags. Ea bag this yr is getting smaller & little pieces/Crumbs. She loves the Flakes, not little pieces/crumbs. Not sure what going on but I will be now lookg for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: R.K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Dust
customer_reviews.text: This is the first, and last time I will order Bonito Flakes in a bag. The flakes were all crushed to dust upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Cremant

customer_reviews.title: Irresistible. Most favorite treat. High quality!
customer_reviews.text: Our 10-year old Gilbert has been enjoying these for years. He DEVOURS them. They are just shaved dried fish so we feel good about not giving him junk. I’ve tried other brands. These are the best. Do not reco the kind from another brand in the 5lb bag. Tried once and they smelled bad (chemically) and too many to keep fresh. Cat-man-doo are worth every penny! UPDATE: the last bag I got was completed flattened and most of the flakes were more like dust. Disappointed but hoping a one time packaging issue. Pretty expensive for a busted bag.
customer_reviews.author: maddie

customer_reviews.title: THE VERY BEST, HEALTHY, ALL NATURAL CAT TREAT!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 cats fight over who gets the most when I feed them these all natural bonito flakes. My little girl has become very vocal and bugs me all the time to sneak her a few flakes but as soon as I open the bag her brothers come running. Even if they are upstairs. I thought I had found a treat they would all like but Cat-Man-Doo Bonito Flakes have turned my cats into kitty monsters. The best cat treat available on the market today. All natural and totally healthy. When the bottom of the bag has the most crushed flakes I mix them with their wet food so there is no waste.
customer_reviews.author: Not Your Average Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Bad (big) bag of Cat-Man-Doo Bonito flakes
customer_reviews.text: Please enlarge photo - you will see immediately to what I am referring. Sadly, cannot exchange one of the bags. Although, it shouldn’t be a problem as bag is unopened! 3 were fresh and full of air - as always. But the 4th is flat, discolored and old looking. I order this frequently, so very familiar with the product. I won’t use the discolored, flat bag. Would certainly appreciate being able to exchange for a fresh bag. Odd that I cannot!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good treats, apparently lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, one likes these, the other doesn't. There are a lot of complaints about getting packs that are near or past their expiration date. Well it's dried fish, as long as it stays sealed it will last for years past date. I found a container of these at home that I had bought near the end of 2011, and have been giving it to my cats for the past few weeks. The flakes expired almost eight years ago, and they look & smell brand new, my cat loves it. Don't worry, the stuff is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gray

customer_reviews.title: These are delicate, easily broken. My pets won't eat fish dust.
customer_reviews.text: The sticker on the bag says it all! Its DELICATE! I've been buying this product a couple of times a month for over a year and its usually ok. Usually. Once in awhile Amazon will ship it with something else in the box and the flakes will be beaten to dust. This time it was shipped in an envelope and it's now mostly dust with a couple of whole flakes. This is a complete waste of $20!
customer_reviews.author: Cobalt babe

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this particular brand because the ingredients are only "dried bonito flakes", nothing else. So far, I haven't been disappointed as my cats absolutely adore them. There's quite a lot in the bag and they should last a while...but you know, the boys are always begging so I've had to buy them a number of times. I don't even mind paying the $20 or so for the bag because it makes the cats so happy. I've also recommended these to a couple of friends whose cats had the same reaction to the bonito flakes. So...win.
customer_reviews.author: myopc2012

customer_reviews.title: This is not cat crack
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bag of this to use to distract patients in a fear-free practice. So far, about 1 in twenty cats respond to it. Admittedly, cats are less likely to be distracted than dogs by food, but this product just hasn't lived up to they hype reviews I've seen. Yes it is fresh, yes it is stinky, but no, cats don't go nuts over it.
customer_reviews.author: James Hughes

customer_reviews.title: My picky boys are OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a topper and also put it under their wet food and they gobble it right up! They are so obsessed with this that any time I take out a bag that looks remotely like this one, they go wild thinking it's theirs. I saw a few reviews about the bags being smashed, that must no longer be happening because mine was in perfect condition. Your cats will love you if you get them this! Just be prepared for their unwavering obsession.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: They used to be in plastic containers which I liked better because the flakes didn't crush to dust over ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat adores these flakes and has for years. They used to be in plastic containers which I liked better because the flakes didn't crush to dust over the time it took to go through one. Now - despite the picture - they come in plastic zip-top bags. Mine seem to turn to dust about halfway through the bag. My cat doesn't care for the dust so even tho I put it in her bowl, she walks away from it. By the way, these flakes also make her thirsty! So be prepared with water.
customer_reviews.author: CCinNC

customer_reviews.title: Tasty cat treat for fickle eaters!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! He’s a picky older cat who is on a special diet canned food for chronic kidney disease and he won’t eat that food without something good smelling on top. I just sprinkle some of these bonito flakes on top of his canned food and he is actually excited to eat! At least now I know he gets calories and nutrients, even though it’s not part of his prescribed diet.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Powdered
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for someone else's cat, and I assuming the cat will like it. However, I knocked off two stars since the flakes arrived in a padded envelope, and they were almost all crushed such that it looks like power. Imagine if a bag of potato chips were shipped in an envelope. :(
customer_reviews.author: Iron Drive

customer_reviews.title: The only bonito flakes I'll buy
customer_reviews.text: I use these as meal toppers for my cats' calorie control wet food which, as you might imagine, isn't their favorite food. Adding the bonito flakes and stirring it into their food makes all the difference in the world. These flakes are very, very soft and light unlike pretty much every other brand I've tried (which is most). Many others are hard and sharp. who wants hard and sharp in their mouths when soft and airy is available? Go with this brand and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and good for cats ( and dogs)
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 3 cats ( and the dogs) love these flakes! One cat begs for them every night and comes running when he hears the cupboard door opening. The flakes are large and stay fresh in the zip lock bag. The only negative is that by the time you get to the bottom, there are only small pieces. The dog likes those but the one cat will only eat the full flakes!
customer_reviews.author: K. Gable

customer_reviews.title: Great kitty treat!
customer_reviews.text: Two of my three cats cannot get enough of these flakes. The third, Annabelle, is a diva who remains finnicky and difficult about her meals and her treats. I can neither speak to the flavor nor appeal since they smell to high heaven, but if my Thatch and Stella give it a paws up, how can I give these bonito flakes anything but a rave?
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Crack for cats
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I had never given my cat these until I bought them on a whim. My kitty had IBD so he has a very specific and very bland diet. I added these to his food because he’s usually not too interested in it and all I have to say is WOW! He can’t seem to get enough of it. It’s very smelly, but he loves fish which he normally can’t eat so he loves these flakes. An easy way to add something hopefully without causing issues with his IBD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My old very finicky cat LOVES this stuff. Vet ...
customer_reviews.text: My old very finicky cat LOVES this stuff. Vet thought he would die two years ago, and I credit this stuff with him still doing well, because he will eat this no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: My foodie cat won’t touch it
customer_reviews.text: Still risk there hooman! I’ve been trying for a month but my cat just won’t eat it. My boy is an orange domestic and he basically eats EVERYTHING. I even had another friend try on his cat, she won’t touch it either.
customer_reviews.author: SianXu

customer_reviews.title: My cats love Catmando
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product. I'm on my second bag, and will soon be ordering another bag for my cats. The product "stretches" a long way-lots for them to eat as snacks.
customer_reviews.author: aheyms

customer_reviews.title: Does not come in containers
customer_reviews.text: I expected product to be in containers as shown. The flakes came in bags and flakes were crushed to very small particles.
customer_reviews.author: amfups

customer_reviews.title: I have been feeding my cat this product for years ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding my cat this product for years now...but something is wrong with the last bag I ordered. My cat had been throwing up her food that I would sprinkle with bonito so I REALLY narrowed down her diet to just her raw food...and no snacking....for the last few weeks. But this morning, I tried the bonito again and she threw it up seconds after eating it. I still have over half a bag left and the return window was up 2 weeks ago...I wish I had realized this was the problem sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Product arrives crumbled
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves the Bonita Flakes, however they arrive about 50% too crumbled. She will not eat them when they are pulverized. I would like to see better packaging such as a box with bubble wrap. Other sources package them much better and they arrive in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Tasty! Can't shake them to call the cats
customer_reviews.text: I was summoning the cats by shaking the carton of the cattyshack cat nip treats; but these treats are no longer made. I ordered these looking for a replacement. They are the consistency of pillow stuffing so there is no noise. Because they are so light and flakey it's hard to give them just a little and keep it neat. Usually a cat walks away unaware that there is some of it hanging out of the side of his mouth. But, both cats really like them and it's a nice reward.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: They're obviously good. They use them at the shelter I adopted ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat, Mr. Blue, loves it. As a matter of fact I don't give it to him anymore because he became addicted to it and Bonito Flakes was all he could think about. If I ever decided to give it to him again, I would take it out of the plastic bag and put it in another container because every time he heard the crinkly sound, no matter what it was, he would come running in a desperate and agitated way. They're obviously good. They use them at the shelter I adopted him from to give the kittens treats, like after they have to have medicine or something. Judi
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Expensive treat, arrived like mush.
customer_reviews.text: Should be in very thin strips, looking like bacon. It is fragile, I know. But both bags arrived entirely mashed up! Last time it was in good shape. I was happy. Cats happy! This is an expensive cat treat! The cats don’t like it all mashed up. Won’t eat it. They want it in strips. I’m disappointed. Cats are disappointed. I don’t know what to do. Almost $40.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron Chapman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING product; wish the packaging were better!
customer_reviews.text: These flakes are a life-saver for us -- we use them to give our cat the drugged chews every morning that keep his heart healthy, and we always joke that we could wrap an old shoe in them, and he'd probably eat it!! The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because we can't actually use about 1/4 of each bag because it turns to dust in the packaging, rather than staying in flake form (and kitties don't eat dust!). This is really frustrating -- I try not to think about the waste of money, but it really does bug me.
customer_reviews.author: dlonyc4

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this stuff but the plastic container arrived broken (product unusable)
customer_reviews.text: Before I begin knocking this item, I want to say that my cats are absolutely nuts about Cat-Man-Doo dried Bonito flakes! However, as for this amazon sale, it was not a good experience. Because the cylindrical plastic container arrived crushed and the dried fish flakes scattered all about in the shipping box! Unexceptionable. I notified amazon.com and it shipped out (immediately) another order of same. Arrived A-OK. Would I buy this again? Yes, if the container is changed or the shipping packaging is done correctly. I gave it only 3 stars because of the broken plastic container in the first shipping of the item. Again, cats LOVE this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: dl8ch

customer_reviews.title: Cat Candy (or, as we say, Kitty Crack)
customer_reviews.text: I have not personally used the product, but my 12 year old Siamese has. She gets it every night as her daily treat. (Warning: do not come between Annie and her CatManDoo.). She rates it as 5++. She only rates me as a 4, even though I buy it for her and give it to her every night. I'm quite certain her rating of me would drop to <=3.5 were I to miss a night.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for your cat
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I originally bought this stuff at a pet store where they called it "kitty crack." My cat goes crazy over this stuff, and so does my next door neighbor's cat. And I used this stuff to train my cat -- he now will sit, stay, lie down, and come because I used this stuff to train him. And to get my cat to come inside, al I now have to d is call his name and yell "treat, treat" and he comes running.him If your cat doesn't absolutely love you, feed him some of this stuff and he or she will quickly start to love you.
customer_reviews.author: AMW

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but the most loved treat ever
customer_reviews.text: Ok it’s REALLY expensive. But it’s the ONLY treat I get that ALL my cats LOVE. I have five fussy fuzzies. Usually any given great a couple will like. They all go crazy for this. They know the sound of this bag over others. I wish they loved a less expensive treat but they are all divas I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Pita

customer_reviews.title: Cat crack
customer_reviews.text: If you have a fussy kitty, these are like crack for kitties! My one cat won't eat her wet food unless I sprinkle some of these on top.
customer_reviews.author: catchickenlady

customer_reviews.title: Cat went nuts for these
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! And they are much better than the grain filled treats we've given her in the past. She gets some in the morning and some at night and she gets so excited about it. It's funny to watch...even funnier to watch her eat them. She gobbles them up like crack. Will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Cats love owner hates packinging
customer_reviews.text: My cats are addicted to this stuff but since they switched to the plastic bag instead of the plastic container, almost one-third of the flakes (at the bottom) are crumbs, which my cats will not touch. This product is already expensive, this makes it even more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy E. Lamberts

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty disappointed the fact when I opened the box I looked at the package and it was cut open already. That's not sanitary especially right now with of the sickness going around. I would like either a refund or be able to get a new unopened bag please. It's not okay for what I experienced and I was really excited for my cats to try.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Cleaves

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: Our cats really love this product. The seal on it is not working that well so we have to use it up within two weeks once open or the color will change.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lin

customer_reviews.title: my cats are crazy for this
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I open the bag...does not matter if my cats are are on the other side of the house, they start running like crazy. I bet they can smell (it's super intense). It's the best treat ever, they do not have the same reaction with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Normally, this is a great product, but this time the flakes are broken and smashed. This makes it more difficult for my cat to eat. I ordered two bags and they're both like that. It's like buying a bag of potato chips and opening the bag to find them all crushed. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: RomanceReader

customer_reviews.title: One eye kitty approved
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure about flavor because they're for the cat but she absolutely loves these treats. They're her favorite. Picture is of me opening the bag. She gets excited just from the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Christine

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats and one of them doesn’t really care for these, but the other goes CRAZY for them! I’ve never seen her more excited for a treat. If your kitty loves fish flavors, you should give these a try. They’re a bit stinky but it’s worth it for a happy kitty :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie88

customer_reviews.title: This treat is a consistent delight to my cat
customer_reviews.text: The fact that my cat always loves this particular treat delights me too. Because it is with this treat that I am able to give her l-lysine powder which helps make a difference in keeping her herpes virus symptoms latent. I am so grateful to have such a wonderful treat, these flakes, to both satisfy her tastebuds and help keep her healthy.
customer_reviews.author: D Ditrick

customer_reviews.title: Flakes only please.
customer_reviews.text: package size is ok. But the product should have been better protected against crushing. These are fish flakes. I would have loved to see a bit of more care such as card-board dividers between the six packages to prevent rubbing against each other and crushing the product. I felt a good portion of my shipment is crushed. My cats like to each the flakes but not when it is mushed. I like to see some care in packaging this item as it does need special attention to detail to prevent crushing. Can you imaging what you get in a potato chips bag if the bag is dropped a few times from 5ft on the ground?
customer_reviews.author: Suresh B.  Sikharam

customer_reviews.title: Big dude loves them
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these tuna flakes. He never eats his wet food, so these are a great way for me to add in more protein into his diet. They are also very healthy for him. The only draw back was that they did not come in a nice little plastic tub. I was hoping for the tub because I prefer that, but my cat doesn't care. I gave some to his little buddy that is usually a very picky eater and he also likes them. Although their other house mate turned her nose up at them and played with the flakes instead of eating them. Overall great product, but not 100% as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Extra Large, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This bag of dried Bonito Flakes arrived on time and in great condition. Most of the flakes are very large, few were broken into bits as some have reported. The smell is not bad at all--just like smoked fish. My wife hides them for the cat to hunt. We watch him follow his nose and scarf them down. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Cats love these! Clean their plates
customer_reviews.text: I did not taste it myself but judging from clean plates the cats loved it. Remember this is a treat not a meal, but becaus it is pure bonito, it has no extra ingredients to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Neece

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it but it's fragile.
customer_reviews.text: My cats really love this stuff. The only reason I don't give it five stars is because it's quite easy to give to your cats when there are actually flakes to give. About halfway through you end up with tiny sand-like flakes and it's really hard to give it to your cats in any way that isn't messy. I ended up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Dethomas

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum say the kitties
customer_reviews.text: Cats love them sprinkled on their food. Can’t give too much at one time since it is extra loaded with protein and my cats have dietary issues, but great to find something they love so much. Wish it was more affordable, but this is by far the best option I have seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnne H.

customer_reviews.title: Kitty LOVES the bonito flakes
customer_reviews.text: My cat adores the bonito flakes. When she is being finicky and not eating her wet food, I'll sprinkle some of the bonito flakes on it and that takes care of the problem. The flakes make for a nice treat on their own, too. I like that the bag is resealable.
customer_reviews.author: Lee T

customer_reviews.title: My cat is addicted
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too fond of the fishiness of the smell, but I can tell my cat adores this treat. I can see how much shinier her fur is too. I give it more as a treat than a meal topper since she devours her food just fine without any additives.
customer_reviews.author: Aziza C.

customer_reviews.title: Encourages Our Sick Cat To Eat
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old cat has renal failure and lost his appetite. Catmandoo's bonito flakes are doing well on encouraging him to eat. Their bonito flakes are mentioned on a couple feline support groups. Cats love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them
customer_reviews.text: All the cats are bananas over these. They smell awful to humans, but the cats love them. Towards the end of the bag you do get a lot of fish dust. Could be an issue if your cat has a respiratory problem. Makes my cat sneeze.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Cat will eat almost anything with flakes sprinkled on top!
customer_reviews.text: I have one cat (of three) that adores this! Was great to get super sized bag at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Normburn

customer_reviews.title: BonitaFlakes
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats with different appetites. One eats Bonita flakes as a meal. And the other two like them as a treat. These Bonita Flakes are not cheap, but they are heathy -- pure protein. I highly recommend for finicky eaters and as treats. A special thank you to Amazon. A recent reorder of this product never reached me for some unknown reason. While the carrier said that it was delivered, I never received it. I called Amazon Customer Service for help. The Customer Service representative quickly refunded my purchase. Amazon is a first class company. Shop there with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Babette Penton

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate Cat Treat
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely LOVES these treats. My cat normally does not go for treats, but LOVES these, she will chomp them right out of my hand, which she never does. I found it surprising that she likes them so much, since she does not like fish flavored cat food. I typically feed 3-5 "flakes" every couple of days as a treat. My cat acts like a kitten when she gets them. Only downside is they smell VERY VERY fishy when you open the package, which is expected, since they are fish flakes :) My product came is a large resealable plastic bag, not a container like what is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Waller

customer_reviews.title: They are an excellent appetite stimulant
customer_reviews.text: I feed my cat exclusively wet food, but even that isn't tasty enough to stoke his appetite. So I sprinkle some of these tuna flakes on top. They are an excellent appetite stimulant. I try not to overdo it, though, because I worry about the possibility of mercury poisoning. Unfortunately the company hasn't put out any information regarding the mercury content of this item.

customer_reviews.title: Edyta
customer_reviews.text: My cat is addicted to this product!!!! Everyday 8 am he is demeaning to have it if not he would never leave me alone !!! He will need to be send for flakes addict rehab soon !!!!! I can’t afford it this cat habit 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Edyta

customer_reviews.title: My Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase because my cat just loves this as a treat. It has beneficial nutritious value like taurine, fish oils, etc which makes it a healthy treat.
customer_reviews.author: Perry M

customer_reviews.title: WARNING PROTEIN CAUSES KIDNEY DISEASE
customer_reviews.text: WARNING!! My vet said these flakes likely caused my cat's kidney disease which was just diagnosed. I was giving them to her twice a day as a treat thinking this would be better than kibble treats. I learned too much protein is very very bad for them, and these flakes are 76% HIGH PROTEIN.
customer_reviews.author: TRP

customer_reviews.title: Packaging crushes flakes
customer_reviews.text: Flakes get crushed. The packaging should allow flakes to stay in whole pieces. The bottom of the bag has crushed flakes that look like powder. My car does like/eat them
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat can't beat the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky cat but man does he love these. He is kinda standoffish but comes trotting when the bag krinkles. I use it as a reward for good behavior too and I like to think that the treat helps.
customer_reviews.author: J. O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Crack!
customer_reviews.text: My cat adores these Bonito Flakes! Although they are somewhat out of our price range, I purchase them because she LOVES them. She gets them as a treat and goes bonkers! Totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE

customer_reviews.title: These treats are purrrrrrfect.
customer_reviews.text: My 5.5 month old adolescent kitten has never had a kitty snack, I give him his wet and dry food and that is it. I gave him a taste of the Bonito flakes and at first he turned his nose up. I tried it again later in the day and something kicked in, he devoured what I gave him. I have to hide the bag because I have caught him trying to chew the bag open to get more. The only time he meows a lot is when it's snack time, I think we have found a winner.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Two Siamese Cats Addicted to Bonita Flakes
customer_reviews.text: I have three Siamese cats. When I first saw this product at a local pet store, I thought I would give it a try since one of my cats will only eat dry food. It was available in one ounce containers and it was expensive. When I discovered that Amazon was shipping this product in four ounce bags at a lower price per ounce, I switched over to Amazon. One cat eats this exclusively. One cat eats it as a treat in addition to wet canned food. This is a great product for your feline pets since it is healthy and is protein based with no fat.
customer_reviews.author: Babette Penton

customer_reviews.title: greatest treat ever
customer_reviews.text: I give my dog and cat both a pinch of this treat, and they both anxiously wait, while I get ready for bed. They are just where I want them to be, and they both love love love this. No cans to open, they get just the amount I want them to have, and no mess at all. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: The extra large flakes work SO well for my cats
customer_reviews.text: These bonito flakes are labelled as larger flakes for dogs. However I have found my cats enjoy these better than the smaller ones 'meant' for them. The smaller flakes, by the bottom of the bag, are crushed/pulverized. My cats refuse to even try to eat those. These larger flakes start out bigger...but manageable even for my smallest cats. And, by the end of the bag, the flakes are still large enough to interest my cats. The product itself, the bonito flakes from CatManDoo, is already a quality one my animals love. This larger size makes them extra-appealing for my critters!
customer_reviews.author: Lessa_E

customer_reviews.title: My cats love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: My cats just love these things, but prices fluctuate at the local pet store like gold prices. My babies don't require a lot of them to make them happy, so they last awhile with a big bag like this. They're a hit with the furballs!
customer_reviews.author: Lallen

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: My cats are not "foodies". No food or treat motivates them. Can you imagine a cat that shrugs at tuna? I clicker train my cats and until I found these flakes, I had a tougher time getting them motivated in their training. Just the crinkle of the plastic perks up their ears. The "super model" cat that appears to subsist on air will come running full tilt. If I sprinkle a few flakes on their food, whatever 'health food' I am feeding them will be eaten. And yes, I see the irony that cats that will turn up their noses at fresh tuna love dried fish flakes. Whatever. It works.
customer_reviews.author: S. Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Morning Nums
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES these... She gets a small pinch every morning for breakfast!! Unfortunately, that means I get a wake-up call on those weekends I try to sleep in!! There are some mornings when she nudges my hand "just so" and gets a tuna-lanche.. I feel good about giving them to her because they are a healthy treat that she adores.
customer_reviews.author: Burton

customer_reviews.title: Man, is this stuff stinky!
customer_reviews.text: But my two cats are frantic for it and gobble it up. One of them could smell it even before I cut open the plastic bag. Then, once I'd fed them some, I resealed the bag and had to put it under a sheet to hide it--and still, one kept trying to get at it under the sheet. I can't stand the stink, but boy, do the cats love it! A huge success. Very glad I bought it, and will buy more when this stinky stuff is gobbled up.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Mack

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack.
customer_reviews.text: My cats have an expensive habit. I'm trying to wean them down. One of them is going to steal a credit card to buy extra. I can't afford this!
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Mine are addicted to them and this seller is the best value for money I have found
customer_reviews.text: If you've never tried these for your cats, you should. Mine are addicted to them and this seller is the best value for money I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful treat for your cat!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these Bonito Flakes. They stay fresh, even with only one cat eating them as a special treat. Thank you Cat-Man-Doo! Love, K-Man the Grey
customer_reviews.author: P J

customer_reviews.title: My cat and dog love these treats.
customer_reviews.text: They were great and what else can I say. The cat and dog both love them and it is the first time I have ordered these. I usually get the Freeze Dried Salmon but it was unavailable. I now have ordered these treats multiple times and they are well received by my pets and the pets of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Truman Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A healthy snack for a finicky cat
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I have ordered these several times for our Russian blue, for they're the only cat treat that she likes! The large bag usually lasts her at least 2 months, & one pinch of flakes is more than enough. She's crazy about these cat treats, & they're a healthier snack than some of the other alternatives that she doesn't care for. If you're in search of a treat for a pickier cat, don't hesitate to give these a try!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Haley-Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: My Vet Said . . .
customer_reviews.text: that tumors love carbs. Any cat treat that is held together and formed into shapes has carbs. This treat doesn't and my cats love it. Even my kitten will eat the more powdery flakes from the bottom of the bag. It's a good deal because there are REALLY a lot of flakes packed into the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Norma P

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Cat-Man-Doo Bonito Tuna Flakes for many years, and my cats (and small dog) love them more than any other treat!!! It's good protein for them, and although I feed it to them as a treat, it also works to "jump start" their appetite when I add some flakes to their food. This item has a very strong fish smell, but it isn't offensive. It's a good smell considering it is fish. I've never met a cat who didn't love these Bonito Flakes. I never want to run out!!!
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: All my kitties love them. All I have to do is go ...
customer_reviews.text: It's true- these are kitty crack! All my kitties love them. All I have to do is go near where we keep them, and they will line up for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kismetmiao

customer_reviews.title: 2 cats approved yummy
customer_reviews.text: Our cats go crazy for these fish flakes. Finicky eaters, they don’t touch their food unless it is garnished with the flakes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: My cat will perform for this treat
customer_reviews.text: Loved mixture of big flakes in pkg. Cat will shake hand/paw for some lg flakes. She will crawl thru tunnel to get some of the treat at other end of tunnel
customer_reviews.author: Barbarella

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein Treat
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this treat. If I ask my older cat if she wants "fishies," she knows exactly what I mean. She begins meowing and goes to the pantry. I like this treat mainly because it is protein, and not full of carbs. My older cat is on a weight loss program, and bonito flakes do not contain very many calories. I can still give our other cat (who is very slim) a crunchy carb snack and not feel as though I am depriving our older cat.
customer_reviews.author: micia

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitty Crack ever according to my cats! 😸
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this brand. Have tried other brands and they aren't impressed. They think this is the Best Kitty Crack ever! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Tigger and Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: These are packed well so they don't arrive in crumbs!
customer_reviews.text: These flakes are sent in good condition and they stay that way if you're careful with them. I've had others that just crumble to dust. My cat loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Makes your cat fat AND obedient. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My cats are ADDICTED to this food. It's seriously like they are on cocaine or something. I use this food to lure my two cats of my life into my house, it's like fishing but with cats. This stuff works every time, no more yelling "KITTY!!!" trying to get her into the house, just show them the bag and they will walk right in. Be careful, you might get a fat obedient cat.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni L.

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these several times as my cat loves them after he gets his meds. He wouldn't, however, touch the last bag I bought. He would sniff them and walk away. I bought a separate container from another seller and he's back to eating them again. I'm not sure if I got a bad batch, but I think I will be purchasing from elsewhere for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE KOHNKE

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for four rather than five stars for this "kitty crack" is the last batch had too many small flakes. Other than that, the price is great, which is good because our Samson has a little addiction problem and demands this stuff every morning... he now asks for seconds. Every time I get a new bag I'm impressed by how fresh the flakes are.
customer_reviews.author: K. G. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: The cats go wild for this product!
customer_reviews.text: The cats go wild for this product. They really do and there's no additives or junk added - it's just dried flaked fish. They eat it like potato chips then beg for more. The only reason it did not get 5 stars is the exorbitant price.
customer_reviews.author: ~~C~~

customer_reviews.title: My Picky Cat Wouldn’t Touch Them
customer_reviews.text: These flakes came highly recommended to me when I was struggling to transition my stubborn car from a dry diet to a healthy wet food diet. The product is well packaged and very fragrant (read: the fish stank is real) but my cat licked the once and walked away.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not all cats (or cat treats) are created equal
customer_reviews.text: My cat refused to eat one when I first opened the package. So, I sprinkled some on her dry food, which she loves. That dry food (& these flakes) sat there for 2/3's of the day until I dumped them out & gave her fresh food. I again placed some in her bowl for her to snack on overnight. Nope; not even touched! If your cat is exceptionally finicky like mine; don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but expensive
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these bonito flakes, but they’re so expensive and go so quickly. The texture is unique; they feel as light as air. I won’t be buying these regularly, just as a rare treat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary123

customer_reviews.title: Some cats "doo", some don't
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be either a love 'em or leave 'em product. I have 7 cats. Four are males and three females. The two oldest males are absolutely nuts about these flakes. They know where they are stored and cry whenever I go near there. They would eat them all day if I let them. The two younger male cats and the females are not even the least bit interested. They haven't even been tempted to try them. All I can say is that if your cat eats these they will probably be crazy about them and if they don't seem interested at first, they probably won't ever be.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Great cat treat, arrived undamaged
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the extra large bag (4oz). I was pleased to find the bag in good shape upon arrival without too much "tuna dust" that forms if the flakes are crushed. My cat loves this stuff. I tried a smaller bag from a pet store, but was pleased with the lower price tag online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's flakes of pure tuna.  If your cat likes tuna, they will ADORE this
customer_reviews.text: My cat is absolutely nuts for tuna. She'll do anything for more of these flakes. I buy them regularly. And you can't get healthier than 100% protein.
customer_reviews.author: xThuglash

customer_reviews.title: MY CATS BEG FOR THIS
customer_reviews.text: With 6 cats, this doesn't last for long, but it's their favorite!!! Very light large flakes with a strong flavor. When I open the bag of Bonito Flakes, all 6 cats come running to wherever I am, and can hardly wait to get their portion. My Yorkie-poo is also a Bonito Flakes addict. I first learned of these flakes from my vet, who used them to treat her cat patients, but they are also recommended for dogs. A healthy snack for my furry friends :)
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Cat Treat!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this treat. Previously having a diabetic cat, I had switched to all grain free options for him and this was a perfect choice for a cat treat for him. This is one of the only few cat treats my current cats have now. Some dogs also love these!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Treat!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat love these, he comes running when he hears us pull the bag out! Much larger amount than what I typically got in stores.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES dried bonito flakes! And I love the big bag convenience and better price.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this five stars if all of my cats loved bonito flakes. But, of three, only one seems to be a fish eater. So, it's not a guaranteed win by any means. However, the one that loves it REALLY loves it. She would eat the whole bag if we let her. Unlike dried cod or salmon chunks, we don't get any coughing or vomit with this. My only real complaint about this product is that by the time we're getting down to the bottom of the bag, the flakes have crumbled into a dust which we will give her, but it makes a real mess.
customer_reviews.author: kmpneufeld

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty hears the bag and comes SPRINTING to get some. I wish it was more affordable, but it’s absolutely a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kay

customer_reviews.title: They're okay but not addicting
customer_reviews.text: It's hard for me to review these as I have two cats. One is crazy for them, one won't touch them. I didn't realize they were actual shavings, paper thin shavings of the fish. It's like feeding curly paper to my cats. Not easy to do. But as I stated before, one of my cats really likes it so I put a little in a bowl and let him worry about how to eat it. The price is good for cat treats and the container is big. I'm glad we tried it but I probably won't repurchase it. I'll stick with the freeze dried salmon...both cats are crazy for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my cats go crazy for these bonito flakes! They cant get enough. Compared to prices at pet stores and boutiques, this is a much better deal. However when I went to Japan, these were only $3 US dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Sun

customer_reviews.title: Our cat LOVES this product. When I crack open ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat LOVES this product. When I crack open this bag for Saturday night treat fest, our cat goes into some type of primal hypnotic feline trance and does not regain her composure until the last slender flake is consumed. Be advised that to humans this product is more then a little stinky, my girlfriend hates the smell, but again it's for the cat and not us.
customer_reviews.author: D. Franco

product_meta.title: Catmandoo Bonito Flakes
feature_bullets: Cat-Man-Doo flakes are larger, moister and have a fresher aroma and appearance than other Bonito flakes

Bonito is a bony fish that hails from the tuna family. Cat-Man-Doo bonito is fished wild off the south east coast of Japan in the waters of the Pacific Ocean. It is used extensively in Japanese cuisine for making a savory broth.
The natural fish oils which are found in bonito provide urinary tract health, reduce the buildup of hair balls and will keep your cat or dog’s fur shiny and beautiful.

These scrumptious flakes are a healthy daily snack. They can be served just as they are or can be sprinkled atop your pet’s food. Although bonito has been stereotyped as a food for cats, don’t forget that dogs love fish too.
You can feel great each time you reward your treasured four-legged family member with Cat-Man-Doo Dried Bonito Flakes.

specifications.Manufacturer: Phillips Feed & Pet Supply Natural Balance
